author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the parameter `saveTriggerResults` to `NanoAODOutputModule`, giving users the option of _not_ creating output branches in NanoAOD for the content of `edm::TriggerResults`-related information (this can avoid having hundreds of extra output branches in cases where the trigger results are not needed).

For completeness, `NanoAODRNTupleOutputModule` (the `RNTuple` variant of `NanoAODOutputModule`, I guess) is updated accordingly as well.

The default value of the new parameter is `True`, so the behaviour of every existing workflow remains unchanged.

#### PR validation:

Checked with a non-central workflow that using `saveTriggerResults=False` results in a NanoAOD output without `edm::TriggerResults`-related branches, as expected.

title: NanoAOD: add `saveTriggerResults` parameter to `NanoAOD*OutputModule`
